name: Bumpysphere
description:
IMPORTANT: Your messages are in the bottom-left of the screen! They should always lead you, eventually, to your next objective!

With that out of the way, Bumpysphere was created for Ludum Dare 48 (theme: Deeper and deeper) in about 46 hours.

Controls are listed in the bottom-right corner of the screen.

The following is a walkthrough:

  • Retrieve the suitcase (middle-left of the map)
  • Bring it to the boat (top-middle of the map)
  • Break the chest (middle-right of the map, you have to go through a high-pressure area to get there, but you should be fine if you're quick)
  • Grab the gold bars from the chest
  • Bring them to the boat
  • Retrieve the pearl (bottom right of the map, if you make it to the room where the pearl is and you die, you should be able to respawn with the R key)
  • Return the pearl to the boat
